update:
["UPDATE #2
One Week To Go!
No Man's Land Theatre CompanyCreator
October 9, 2017
Hi everyone!
First off, a huge thank-you to everyone who has donated so far. Receiving so much support means the world to us here at No Man's Land. Without you, this production would not be possible - and thanks to you, we've been able to go above and beyond what we initially had planned! Your generosity means we were able to add a third performance of Othello, which sold out in under an hour. 
Read more", "UPDATE #1
Production Updates
No Man's Land Theatre CompanyCreator
September 20, 2017
We are thrilled to have reached our initial goal so soon! Thank you to everyone who helped us get there. We still have a way to go with our fundraising in order to accommodate our production and the maximum number of audience members. We appreciate your continued support and are so grateful for any donation given. Further donations will be going towards space rental, costumes, and technical support, to give you all the best possible show. 
Read more"]

["UPDATE #24
Hypno-Nightmare Issue #5: Old Hicks is on the way
funktoastCreator
August 22, 2019
Hey all, 
Short of a couple of late comers (which I shipped today) you should have received your rewards for backing this kickstarter. I just wanted to let you know that if you liked the Hypno-Nightmares, I have decided to add Issue #5. It's called Old Hicks. These things were way more work than I anticipated so I decided to launch them 1 at a time from now on.
Read more", "UPDATE #23
Hypno-Nightmares are In the Mail
funktoastCreator
August 8, 2019
Greetings backers,
Short of 2 people who haven't filled out their surveys, I have dropped all of the Hypno-Nightmares in the mail. I will release the digital downloads in 1 week to allow the CDs time to arrive.
Again, thanks a ton for backing this project.
Read more", 'UPDATE #22
CDs have Arrived
funktoastCreator
August 6, 2019
Greetings Beloved Backers,
The CDs have arrived. I have sent out surveys to those of you who backed this project at the CD level. I will ship the CDs, wait 1 week then send out the download links.
Let me know what you think of these. If you dig them, I will do more.
Read more', 'UPDATE #21
Hypno-Nightmares Become Reality
funktoastCreator
August 3, 2019
Greetings beloved backers,
Just wanted to reach out to let you know that 2 of the 4 Hypno-Nightmares have come in. I now have in hand, #3 - Blood Moon Mania and #4 - Naked Feet.
I am waiting for the other 2 to arrive. They should be in on Monday or Tuesday. I will ship these autographed CDs out and wait for a week or so before releasing the digital downloads. I want to make sure those who ordered CDs have them in hand before releasing the digital copies.
Read more', "UPDATE #20
PRODUCTION FINISHED!
funktoastCreator
July 24, 2019
Greetings beloved backers,
Great news. I have finished production on all 4 hypno-nightmares. 
I have to say, this project has turned out to be WAAAAY more work than I expected in the beginning. At the inset, I expected to do 4 nightmares at about 30 minutes each. I learned I couldn't adequately tell the stories that needed to be told along with wiring in the inductions and awakenings so I expanded the project.
Read more", 'UPDATE #19
Naked Feet â€¢ Excellent Progress
funktoastCreator
July 16, 2019
Greetings all,
The hypno-nightmare project commences with great rapidity. I finished recording the copy for Naked Feet. I am halfway through sound production (sound effects and sweetening). Meantime, here is a sneak preview of the cover.
Read more', 'UPDATE #18
Introducing the Cover for Hypno-Nightmare Episode #1: Evil Exhumed
funktoastCreator
July 13, 2019
Greetings all,
I have decided to release the Hypno-Nightmare CDs as episodes. Here is the cover layout for Episode #1: Evil Exhumed. I think you are going to dig these.
Read more', 'UPDATE #17
Hypno-Nightmare 3 (of 4) is Complete
funktoastCreator
July 10, 2019
Greetings beloved backers,
Just checking in to let you know that I finished Blood Moon Mania, the 3rd (of 4) hypno-nightmares this morning.
I am now moving onto the last one, Naked Feet. I will revise the copy until it is perfect then go into recording. I am making quick progress on these. I should have them all done soon. After completing them, I will send them off for CD replication to get the collectible, autographed copies.
Read more', 'UPDATE #16
Hypno-Nightmare 2 Finished
funktoastCreator
July 8, 2019
Greetings beloved backers,
Production of the 4 hypno-nightmares commences. I have finished scoring music for Evil Exhumed, the 2nd Hypno-NIghtmare.
I am diving into music for Blood Moon Mania.
This project is getting closer every day.
Read more', "UPDATE #15
Making Excellent Progress
funktoastCreator
July 2, 2019
Dear beloved backers,
I spent the morning scoring music for the second (of 4) hypno-nightmares. This one is called Blood Moon Mania. I managed to compose the first 7 minutes of music. I'm working as hard as I can to get this project finished and out to you.
Again, thank you so much for your support on these hypno-nightmares. I've been listening to the first completed nightmare, Long Night of the Draugr. I can say first hand that I think you are going to love these.
Read more"]

['UPDATE #8
Site launched - please sign up
Steven MaloneyCreator
September 25, 2016
Guys, please go to accompanymusic.com and sign up for a free trial.  I will then extend your membership.  The app has been beta tested and works beautifully.  
Please excuse the delay on the physical merch -  you will receive your items in October.
Read more', 'UPDATE #7
Please wait for invitation email prior to sign up
Steven MaloneyCreator
July 5, 2016
Guys, the site is almost ready to use; per the developers, please wait for a "welcome email"  before attempting to sign in; it has to do with the transition to the new server.  Thanks!
12
Read more', 'UPDATE #6
Site Launch scheduled for Monday, July 4th
Steven MaloneyCreator
July 2, 2016
Hello friends, this is my last Kickstarter update for now.  Thank you again for helping make Accompany a reality.  
Programming is completed, the system has been thoroughly de-bugged and we just acquired the SSL certificate and it is being installed Monday morning.  Once the SSL cert is installed, Accompanymusic.com will be up and ready to go!  
2
Read more', "UPDATE #5
Final de-bugging underway, additional security protocol added.
Steven MaloneyCreator
June 15, 2016
Hello Accompany Kickstarters - additional security needed to be added, as the site content (just the music content) could easily be compromised until we discovered a glitch. 
Some tech issues persist on Android OS, but Apple and Windows OS devices appear to be working fine.  We've tested on dozens of devices.
Read more", 'UPDATE #4
Testing nearly complete, Beta launch happening very soon!
Steven MaloneyCreator
May 24, 2016
Dear Accompany supporters, our bug testing revealed several glitches which have now been fixed and we are in the final testing stage.  We plan to launch by end of this month.  Updates to follow!
1
Read more', 'UPDATE #3
Testing underway
Steven MaloneyCreator
May 5, 2016
Dear friends and Accompany supporters, 
The site programming is done, the music is 99% uploaded and testing is underway.
We will be launching in near future - updates to follow.
thanks, and all best wishes, 
3

['UPDATE #9
MerKaBa Project installed on my school campus
Michael EmeryCreator
October 22, 2013
13
Read more', 'UPDATE #8
Video of The MerKaBa Project at BRC
Michael EmeryCreator
October 22, 2013
I hope you all enjoy this video I just finished editing of The MerKaBa Project at Burning Man 2013. It took me a while to edit and post to YouTube but I hope it was worth the wait. . This video is of the sculptural centerpiece of MerKaBa,  a hexagonal 9' tall onion dome fabricated from 12 gauge steel and plasma cut with a complex fractal pattern. Within the dome a 7" tall hexagonal mirrored obelisk turned. The dome also contained an amplifier playing a looping soundtrack. The dome was also fitted with 12 infrared sensors which when activated triggered over 200 small sound files played on top of the sound track. At night 6 LCD projectors (housed within projection boxes designed to relate to the domes design) projected an hour long hallucinatory dreamscape video montage. The video montage was looped playing for the duration of the night.
11
Read more', 'UPDATE #7
PS
Michael EmeryCreator
September 30, 2013
ps
I plan to finish sending out my remaining "Thank You" gifts as soon as I have finished with the video. Notwithstanding  a full time teaching job demanding most of my time
Read more', 'UPDATE #6
Come visit
Michael EmeryCreator
September 30, 2013
Just finished installing the MerKaBa dome on my school campus.  I will have our video montage projected onto it with our background sound track playing this Wednesday (10/2) at our "Back To School Night"  If any of you are in the area please come visit.   The address is Soquel High School, 401 Old San Jose Rd, Soquel, Ca 95073
My sculpture is in the second quad (park then walk past the front building to the second quad)
Read more', "UPDATE #5
screengrabs from video footage
Michael EmeryCreator
September 21, 2013
Finally got my computer to sucessfully download video footage of The MeKaba Project at night. Gonna be spending about a week editing and uploading to you tube. I dont know why i get involved in techy art projects when I'm such a Ludite.
The project was beautiful at night.
The video should be beautiful as well.
Read more", 'UPDATE #4

Thanks to all for your assistance in realizing this dream

I have about an hour of good night-video footage that will be edited down to about a 3 minute YouTube Video. I will post the link as soon as it exists.

["UPDATE #6
it's really happening! CD release party in NYC
TragedyCreator
September 4, 2013
- England and Germany: decimated
- Death to False Disco-Metal CDs: manufactured
- Video for It's Raining Men: decimated
- NYC CD release party: your decimation is imminent
Read more", "UPDATE #5
be in Tragedy's video for It's Raining Men this Sunday!
TragedyCreator
July 21, 2013
Tragedy needs ladies (male roles have been cast) for a video shoot tomorrow. Join us and be a part of disco-metal history!
We are shooting the video for the new single, It's Raining Men. 2-5pm, NYC's lower east side.
Email beautyrockrecords@yahoo.com for details.
Read more", 'UPDATE #4
WE DID IT!
TragedyCreator
July 13, 2013
THANX TO YOU!!!
If your pledge reward includes a t-shirt, please send us size and gender info right away, using the contact link on our Kickstarter page: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/tragedy/tragedy-death-to-false-disco-metal-new-cd-video-to/messages/new?message%5Bto%5D=tragedy
Read more', "UPDATE #3
Tragedy's Kickstarter Campaign ends today, Fri July 12 - 7:56pm EDT
TragedyCreator
July 12, 2013
Big, hott love to all of you who have made this a success!!! You have helped Lance keep his left hand unbroken, given hope to Andy Gibbous Waning's relationship with his cat Shadow Dancer, prevented World War Z. But most importantly, you took a stand against false disco-metal and made the release of Tragedy's next album and video a reality.
You have until 7:56pm EDT today to take advantage of these once-in-a-lifetime opportunities...










Read more", "UPDATE #2
ONE WEEK LEFT!!!
TragedyCreator
July 6, 2013
Just one week left until the fates of Tragedy's new album, video and tour funds are decided.  Keep in mind, if we do not reach our goal, we do not to collect any of the funds pledged, and our bold plans will crumble like a sad, stale cookie.  
We have added some exciting new pledge rewards.  If you have already pledged, you are allowed to upgrade to a new reward if you like.  
2
Read more", "UPDATE #1
we're half way there...living on a prayer
TragedyCreator
June 26, 2013
OK party people...we are roughly half-way to our goal, with just over two weeks left.  Big, firm love to all of you that have pledged!!!
Now, the work continues.  Storyboards are being made for the video.  Tracks are being laid for the album.  Confetti cannons are being purchased for the tour.  Lance is being an idiot.
While we are very happy with our achievements thus far, we still have a long way to go.  So spread the word, spread the love!  Give early, give often!
1
Read more"]

["UPDATE #9
Pinned
DicTater has been released on iOS and Android!
Jeremy BoetticherCreator
April 17, 2020
Hello everyone! Once again, thank you for supporting DicTater.
DicTater version 1.1.2 is now released on iOS and Android. The Roots of an Empire expansion along with the base game is released. More updates are coming soon.
If you filled out the Kickstarter survey form, you should have received an email with your code, along with instructions on how to redeem it in-game. If you didn't get this code, or if you didn't fill out the form, please email me at info@dictatergame.com

1
Read more", 'UPDATE #11
Version 1.3.0 for DicTater: Second Expansion Available!
Jeremy BoetticherCreator
October 26, 2020

1
Read more', 'UPDATE #10
Version 1.2.0 of DicTater
Jeremy BoetticherCreator
June 15, 2020
1 month after release, a new update for DicTater has arrived.
Version 1.2.0: Skills adds some extra features:
Skills can be unlocked using prestige, increasing your attributes over time.
A UI Redesign has been completed, standardizing much of the UI and improving user experience for phones with bevels, like the iPhone X.

1
Read more', 'UPDATE #8
DicTater is Releasing on April 15th!
Jeremy BoetticherCreator
April 14, 2020
Hello everyone!
The project has come a long way since the alpha. The first expansion has been finished, a good 96% of the bugs have been squashed, and all of the legal mumbo jumbo has been more or less taken care of.
Thus, the game will be releasing on April 15th!
Read more', "UPDATE #7
Alpha Tests Return with Version 1.0.18
Jeremy BoetticherCreator
February 8, 2020
Hello everyone, I've been pretty quiet in terms of Kickstarter because I've been hard at work. So far the refactored save system has kept up with all of the internal tests, so now it will be pushed to a large scale with the alpha tests.
If you have purchased the $20 level of the rewards or you have already participated in the alpha tests, then you have already been invited to the alpha tests on your respective platform.

Jeremy BoetticherCreator
January 5, 2020
As the title suggests, the campaign for DicTater is now over. Thank you to everyone who supported it. The stretch goal for $2500 was reached, so the game will have event chains for each monument on release. Those who donated to the $300 tier will also be able to create another event chain for their own monument.
Now, as the game is developed, I will continue to write updates. Every week's progress will be detailed in a blog post on DicTater's website, seen . Major updates will also have Kickstarter posts in tandem with the blog posts. Other news on the development of the game can be seen occasionally in the .

['UPDATE #2
Thank you
Emmanuel Adeyefa-Olasupo, BA, Msc, MPhilCreator
February 9, 2015
Thank you to all my backers thus far. With your help we can truly effect millions of lives. 
Spread the news and idea to all your friends, family and anyone who understands that the education of Africans is symbiotic to the emancipation of black people around the world.  
Also feel free to email me if you have any questions or concerns. 
Read more', 'UPDATE #1
Loyalty
Emmanuel Adeyefa-Olasupo, BA, Msc, MPhilCreator
January 28, 2015
All my life I have helped thousands of people. Most of this help came in the form of elevating their minds and rising their level of self understanding. Introducing to them foreign ideas and explaining to them that deep down the key to the world has already been placed within them. 
Years as passed and I now ask them to help not me but others in the Nigerian slums and only one has answered the call thus far. I am not surprised.

['UPDATE #7
Your Kickstarter Reward Is On Its Way! Photos Arriving Soon
Jenifer HowardCollaborator
April 12, 2019
Hello - we just wanted to THANK YOU again for supporting Through the Eyes of Children - aka "Camera Kids" on Kickstarter. We are printing and preparing your photo reward and are in the process of sending them out. Some of you may have already received yours and others are on their way soon! Photo rewards are being sent directly via Social Print Studio, so be on the lookout for your package. We hope you enjoy it! 

Read more', 'UPDATE #6
Reward, PBS NewsHour and TIME
Jenifer HowardCollaborator
April 6, 2019
Hi - we just wanted to let all of our supporters know that we are busy working on fulfilling your rewards. If you haven't answered the Kickstarter survey yet with your mailing address for your reward, please check your email for a note from Kickstarter and respond.
We also are excited to share with you some press coverage that came out this weekend on Through the Eyes of Children and three of our "Camera Kids," Gadi, Bizimana and Mussa, and their work teaching photography to children throughout the world. In addition to teaching photo workshops, the three have spent the last several months traveling throughout Rwanda interviewing genocide perpetrators and their families, creating photographs, video and stories to try to better understand the genocide against the Tutsi happened. April 7 marks 25 years since the start of the genocide in 1994, which left Bizimana, Gadi and Mussa orphans. We are incredibly proud of them.

1
